title: Smartphone Use, Social Support, and Sleep Health
text: Impact of Call and Message

title: Smartphone Use, Social Support, and Sleep Health
text:
Conclusion


Social interaction via smartphone can benefit sleep quality
Interaction with close contacts prolong sleep
Interaction with certain relationships of contacts (e.g. family) prolong sleep

section: Result 5: Pre-Sleep Communication benefit Sleep Quality
text: Result 5: Pre-Sleep Communication benefit Sleep Quality

title: Social Network Activation: Application in Smartphone Use
text: Social Network Activation

title: Social Network Activation: Application in Smartphone Use
text:
Hypothesis 1


H1: Activating social networks with a higher the Degree Centrality of a reduce the time spent on a smartphone.

title: Social Network Activation: Application in Smartphone Use
text:
Hypothesis 2


H2: Activating social networks with a higher the K-Core of a reduce the time spent on a smartphone.

title: Social Network Activation: Application in Smartphone Use
text:
Hypothesis 3

H3: Communication frequency positively moderates the impact of degree centrality and K-Core.

title: Social Network Activation: Application in Smartphone Use
text:
Conclusion


Degree Centrality does not affect smartphone use. H1 not supported.
K-Core reduce over all smartphone use( Communication, others and overall).  H2 supported.
Communication frequency shows NO moderating impact on network features.  H3 not supported.

title: Social Network Activation: Application in Smartphone Use
text:
Result 3
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 2 * np.pi * r
fig, ax = plt.subplots(subplot_kw={'projection': 'polar'})
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()

title: Social Network Activation: Application in Smartphone Use
text:
Result 3: Addiction
global id egoid
global t date2
global ylist addic_noncom90
global mainIV  active_nodes out_contacts  num_edges  steps minsasleep trust close position duration
global Social_Control degree_centrality core_number
global Other_Control i.insession i.weekday community naps nap_minsasleep
global fe i.studyweek
*Set data as panel data
sort $id $t
xtset $id $t

xtreg $ylist $fe  $Other_Control $Social_Control  $mainIV , fe cluster($id) 
xtlogit $ylist $fe  $Other_Control $Social_Control  $mainIV , fe cluster($id) or
outreg2 using SoUnAcSl.tex, append dec(3) addtext(Communication, Full, Unit F.E., YES, Week F.E, YES) keep($mainIV $Social_Control)  title("90 Addiction Estimation")

title: Social Network Activation: Application in Smartphone Use
text:
Result 3: Addiction Esimation (Logistic)
global id egoid
global t date2
global ylist addic_noncom90
global mainIV  active_nodes out_contacts  num_edges  steps minsasleep trust close position duration
global Social_Control degree_centrality core_number
global Other_Control i.insession i.weekday community naps nap_minsasleep
global fe i.studyweek
*Set data as panel data
sort $id $t
xtset $id $t

xtreg $ylist $fe  $Other_Control $Social_Control  $mainIV , fe cluster($id) 
xtlogit $ylist $fe  $Other_Control $Social_Control  $mainIV , fe cluster($id) or
outreg2 using SoUnAcSl.tex, append dec(3) addtext(Communication, Full, Unit F.E., YES, Week F.E, YES) keep($mainIV $Social_Control)  title("90 Addiction Estimation")
